amendment.description: To permit emergency exemptions from compliance with certain laws for highway construction projects.

action.text: Amendment SA 1556 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1761.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1556.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1556 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 47.
Amendment SA 1556 ruled out of order by the chair.
